mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CNT, t1.CONTENT, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.EVENT, t1.EVENTKEY, t1.FORMAT, t1.FROMUSERNAME, t1.INCOMETIME, t1.LOCATION_PREC, t1.LOCATION_X, t1.LOCATION_Y, t1.MEDIAID, t1.MSGTYPE, t1.PICURL, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.RESPARTICLECOUNT, t1.RESPDESC, t1.RESPMEDIAID, t1.RESPMSGTYPE, t1.RESPTIME, t1.RESPTITLE, t1.RESULT, t1.SCALE, t1.SCANCODEINFO, t1.SCANTYPE, t1.THUMBMEDIAID, t1.TOUSERNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t1.WXACCOUNTNAME, t1.WXENTAPPID, t1.WXENTAPPNAME, t1.WXMESSAGEID, t1.WXMESSAGENAME FROM T_SRFWXMESSAGE t1

SELECT t1.CNT, t1.CONTENT, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.EVENT, t1.EVENTKEY, t1.FORMAT, t1.FROMUSERNAME, t1.INCOMETIME, t1.LOCATION_PREC, t1.LOCATION_X, t1.LOCATION_Y, t1.MEDIAID, t1.MSGTYPE, t1.PICURL, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.RESPARTICLECOUNT, t1.RESPDESC, t1.RESPMEDIAID, t1.RESPMSGTYPE, t1.RESPTIME, t1.RESPTITLE, t1.RESULT, t1.SCALE, t1.SCANCODEINFO, t1.SCANTYPE, t1.THUMBMEDIAID, t1.TOUSERNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN, t1.WXACCOUNTID, t1.WXACCOUNTNAME, t1.WXENTAPPID, t1.WXENTAPPNAME, t1.WXMESSAGEID, t1.WXMESSAGENAME FROM T_SRFWXMESSAGE t1
